jd: From: Nitin, Tanisha Systems nitin.singh@tanishasystems.com Reply to: nitin.singh@tanishasystems.com Experience with Mortgage and P&C is must for the role. if you don't have recent exp on both please do not share any profile.At least 8 years of Experience in the full System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) on a variety of technologies and platforms preferably in Property and Casualty and or Life Insurance • At least 8 years of Experience with modeling business processes, data flows, and workflow processes depicting relationships between Insurance data entities. • 6-8 years of Experience and familiarity with P&C insurance domain is a must. • Experience and familiarity with Mortgage domain is a must, experience in Mortgage servicing is preferred• Working knowledge of Business Analysis Standards (i.e. IIBA best practices)• Familiarity with industry standards and technologies, such as ACORD, JSON, XML, and APIs.• Strong oral & written communication skills, Business stakeholder management• Must have performed business requirement analysis, use case modeling from a business analysis/consulting standpoint. • Experience and desire to work in a management consulting environment
